mapper.select: select * from content order by contentNum desc
mapper.insert: insert into wishList (wlNum, userID, contentNum) values (wishList_seq.nextval, #{userID}, #{contentNum})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by w.contentNum desc) as num, w.wlNum, w.userID, w.contentNum, w.addDate, c.contentName, c.contentPrice, c.contentThumbImg, c.cityCode, c.cateCode, c.contentSum from wishList w inner join content c on w.contentNum = c.contentNum where w.userID = #{userID}
